metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8337 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In msmtp 1.8.2 and mpop 1.4.3, when tls_trust_file has its defaultconfiguration, certificate-verification results are not properly checked.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8337` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

msmtp - 1.8.3-1
msmtp-gnome - 1.8.3-1
msmtp-mta - 1.8.3-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

mpop - 1.4.3-1
mpop-gnome - 1.4.3-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: msmtp package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.3-1').
mpop package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.3-1').
